message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.FL

This paper deals with termination analysis of logic programs, which is a topic that falls under the scope of several sub-categories in computer science. The most likely category is cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science), which covers topics related to logic and its applications in computer science. The paper also deals with programming languages and software engineering, which are covered by cs.PL (Programming Languages) and cs.SE (Software Engineering) respectively. The use of automatic methods for termination analysis suggests a connection to artificial intelligence, which is covered by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with finite abstraction of integers, which is a topic related to formal languages and automata theory, covered by cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory).
